remarks: Utility lemma for Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2012.)
statement:
cdleme9b.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme9b.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme9b.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme9b.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme9b.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme9b.c $e |- C = ( ( P .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme9b $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ S e. A /\ W e. H ) ) -> C e. B ) $.
